mapper.select: select id, label, value, code, type, description, create_time, update_time from yjcycc_lottery.sys_dict where id = #{id} limit 1
select id, label, value, code, type, description, create_time, update_time from yjcycc_lottery.sys_dict where id = #{id} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into yjcycc_lottery.sys_dict(label, value, code, type, description, create_time, update_time) values (#{label}, #{value}, #{code}, #{type}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update yjcycc_lottery.sys_dict
label = #{label},
value = #{value},
code = #{code},
type = #{type},
description = #{description},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from yjcycc_lottery.sys_dict where id in (${ids})
